thread.title: Peter Pieragostini
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Peter Pieragostini

author: Peter Pieragostini
title: Peter Pieragostini
text:
Have used Frames Direct a number of times for frames. The selection is terrific. Prices are low (even beating those of my nonprofit HMO, whose selection is adequate and prices are always lower than brick-and-mortar retailers.) Info on the website re: frames and alternatives is great.
However, I do still use my HMO optical dept. for lenses for "peace of mind" regarding proper "pupil mark-up" and final fit.
I'll continue to use Frames Direct.
